overview: Kathlyn Hare, daughter of Col. Hare, a collector of wild animals, is modeling a pet leopard in her alfresco studio, when her younger sister, Winnie, comes in with a collie dog, which excites the leopard into such ferocity that the sister has to seek safety in a cage.
tagline: Kathlyn has leopards for pets and lions for playmates, and her adventures in wild lands pile up a series of experiences most realistic and exciting.
title: The Unwelcome Throne
